channel.title: Indian on Food for Thought
channel.description: Recent content in Indian on Food for Thought

item.title: Baked Okra
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1.5-2 lbs fresh okra (or 2 16oz bags frozen okra)
  • 1 Tbsp vegetable oil
  • 1 tsp salt
  • 1/2 tsp fresh ground pepper
  • 1 tsp tumeric
  • 1 tsp chili powder
  • 1/2 tsp cumin
  • 1/2 tsp coriander
  • 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper

Directions

Preheat oven to 450F (or 425F for convection).

If using fresh okra: wash and dry, trim both ends off, and cut into roughly 1/2inch chunks. If using frozen okra: no prep needed, use frozen directly from bag.

item.title: Butter Chicken
item.description:
Ingredients

For the chicken:

  • 3 lbs of boneless chicken thighs
  • 1/2 cup greek yogurt
  • 2 Tbsp lemon juice
  • 2 Tbsp white wine vinegar
  • 6 Tbsp neutral oil
  • 1 small piece fresh ginger, grated
  • 6 Tbsp Sharwoodâ€™s Tandoori Spice (see mix below)
  • 1 Tbsp fenugreek leaves
  • 2 tsp kosher salt

Sharwood spice mix:

  • 3 Tbsp paprika
  • 1 Tbsp ground turmeric
  • 1 tsp garlic powder
  • 1 tsp ground nutmeg
  • 1 tsp cayenne pepper
  • 1 tsp ground ginger
  • 1 tsp ground coriander
  • 1 tsp ground cumin
  • 1 tsp ground cloves

For the sauce:

item.title: Indian Style Rice
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 1.5 cups basmati rice
  • 1 small onion, thinly sliced
  • 2 Tbsp neutral oil (or ghee)
  • 1 whole cinnamon stick
  • 2 pods green cardamom
  • 2 whole cloves
  • 1 Tbsp cumin seed
  • 1 tsp salt
  • 2.5 cups water

Instructions

Rinse rice. Place rice in a bowl with enough water to cover, let sit while doing remaining steps. If using a rice cooker, you can use the rice cooker bowl for this.
